120-Night Mattress Trial
Bear is so confident that you’ll love your mattress, we are giving you an industry best, 120-night mattress trial. When you buy a Bear, you are buying a high-quality mattress designed and assembled in America, and with that comes the peace of mind that you’ll have time to truly love it. If you don’t, just let us know within your 120-night trial and our friendly, in-house customer service team will gladly assist with the return.



Lifetime Warranty
Lots of companies build mattresses that need to be replaced every couple of years. We don’t. We believe in our products and we back that up with an industry best, Lifetime Warranty. If you ever have a defect with your Bear mattress, our friendly, in-house customer service team is here to help. Read our policy.

The Technology Behind the Best Sleep
Our Elite Hybrid is engineered with Phase Change Material (PCM) and Celliant(TM) technology to promote all-night cooling and natural recovery. The Fryst PCMs are chilling molecules that provide a cooling sensation by transforming from a solid to liquid state when heated by the body. Frequently Asked Questions


How would you rate the firmness of the Bear Elite Hybrid Mattress?

We rate the Firm at 7, the Medium at 6, and the Soft at 5. If you are torn between which feel is best for you, we recommend Medium. With over 80% of sleepers preferring a mattress with a firmness rating between 5.5 and 7.5, the Medium falls right in that sweet spot.





What is the difference between the Bear Elite Hybrid and Bear Hybrid Mattress?

The Elite Hybrid utilizes a Phase Change Material (PCM) that is cool to the touch and advanced zoned-coils for added pressure point relief from head to toe. The Elite Hybrid also offers you an extra inch of cooling comfort and three different firmness-levels to choose between for the ultimate in mattress luxury. Both the Elite Hybrid and Hybrid mattress have Sleep Recovery Technology™ powered by Celliant™ for faster recovery and natural Copper for a cleaner night’s sleep.





Can I customize the firmness of the Bear Elite Hybrid Mattress?

Unfortunately, we cannot offer individual firmness customization on the mattress. Luckily, it comes in three different comfort levels - Soft (plushest feel), Medium (most popular), and Firm (best for heavier sleepers) — so we have no doubt you will find one that suits you perfectly.





Is the Bear Elite Hybrid made in the USA?

We are proud that all Elite Hybrid mattresses are made in the USA using foreign and domestic components. By owning the factory we’re able to control product quality to meet the highest standards, offer competitive prices, and ship them directly to our customers.

Frequently Asked Questions


How would you rate the firmness of the Bear Original?

We designed the Bear Original to have a solid core support with a responsive comfort layer using gel infused foam for cooling comfort. We would categorize the mattress as a medium-firm. With over 10,000 verified customer reviews, our customers give the Bear Original a firmness rating of 7.1 on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the most firm.





What sets the Bear Original apart from other mattresses?

The Bear Original was engineered using multiple layers of cooling, contouring, and comforting memory foam to increase the pressure relieving properties that help you sleep better and recover faster. We also go beyond traditional foams and use cooling-gel memory foam in the comfort layer and our own responsive transition foam to keep your body cool and spine aligned. Choose the Celliant infused cover to get Celliant® technology woven in to promote cooling and recovery. Celliant is a unique fiber that utilizes natural minerals to reflect your body’s natural energy back as light. We worked with experts around the world to design a mattress that is universally comfortable, sleeps cool, helps you recover faster and increases your energy.





Does the Bear Original have a break-in period?

No, the mattress is great from the start! It will probably take you some time to adjust to the feel so we ask you to sleep on the Bear Original for at least 30 nights before you decide to keep or return it.





Does the Bear Original smell?

Bear uses foams that have little to no smell. If anything, it would be very slight when you first unpack the mattress, like a new pair of sneakers, and then will dissipate within a couple days.





What type of base do I need for the Bear Original mattress?

Our bed is designed to lay on any hard, flat surface. We highly recommend the Bear Foundation paired with a bed frame. Other options include a platform bed, adjustable base, or the floor. We don't recommend using a traditional coil box spring, because it does not provide an evenly distributed surface area for foam-based mattresses.





What is the difference between All Foam and Hybrid?

Memory foam, unlike a traditional spring mattress, offers the sensation of contouring your body — a kind of shock absorption for your back that keeps you comfortable throughout the night. With a hybrid, you’ve still got the feeling of a mattress hugging you to sleep, but you also have a… more romantic innerspring bounce. In general, hybrid mattresses tend to have more options when it comes to firmness than memory foam.

Do Bear Natural mattresses contain fiberglass?

Frequently Asked Questions


How would you rate the firmness of the Pro Hybrid?

We designed the Pro Hybrid to include a 6" base of up to 1032 individually encased coils to offer deep compression support while decreasing motion transfer between sleep partners. Plus a comfort layer of gel infused foam for cooling comfort. We would categorize the mattress as a medium-firm. We give the Pro Hybrid a firmness rating of 7.0 on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the most firm.





Does the Pro Hybrid smell?

Bear uses foams that have little to no smell. If anything, it would be very slight when you first unpack the mattress, like a new pair of sneakers, and then will dissipate within a couple days.





What should I rest the Pro Hybrid on?

Our bed is designed to lay on any hard, flat surface. We highly recommend the Bear Foundation paired with a bed frame. Other options include a platform bed, adjustable base, or the floor. We don't recommend using a traditional coil box spring, because it does not provide an evenly distributed surface area for foam-based mattresses.





What is the difference between All Foam and Hybrid?

An all-foam mattress gives your body a unique level of support, aiding in spinal alignment and hugging your body no matter your favorite sleep position. Plus, this is the best option if you or your partner need shock absorption to reduce motion transfer.

A hybrid mattress uses innerspring coils, so you’re getting that tried-and-true support, deeper compression, and classic responsive bounce of a traditional mattress. The top layers of memory foam offer comfort, spinal-alignment, and reduced motion transfer.

Overall, it is rated as a medium-firm mattress, and on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being most firm, Bear Hybrid is categorized as a 6.8.





What is the difference between a Star Hybrid and other mattresses?

The Star Hybrid is a premium mattress combining both coils and foams to create a 13” sleep system that provides a luxury feel, like your favorite hotel bed, that helps you recover faster and sleep better. The Star Hybrid uses Celliant® technology woven into the cover, as well as high air-flow layers to help you sleep cool. The difference is the Star Hybrid uses Serene Gel Foam and has individually wrapped pocketed coils for edge-to-edge support and a hand-tufted quilted top to give you a cloud-like mattress feel.





What type of sleeper will enjoy the Star Hybrid?

The best part of the Star Hybrid mattress is how universal the feel is. Whether you’re a back sleeper or combination sleeper, the Star Hybrid’s reviewers say it's both soft and supportive at the same time. How is that even possible you ask? We can explain, it has a cover quilted with foam, plus 2 more layers of foam. The foam layers are made with gel and copper, plus Celliant® fibers woven into the cover making it engineered to keep the bed cool. To finish off the bed is a thick supportive coil system at the base of the mattress. Even though it has soft foam layers up top, it still offers great support because of its strong coils system so you get benefits of a cushion surface without sacrificing support. We highly recommend the Star Hybrid for side sleepers, combination sleepers (side and back sleepers), and couples of various sizes and sleep positions. The foam layers will cushion your shoulders and hips and prevent painful pressure from building up overnight. It's supportive enough to support the midsection which can sometimes dip if the mattress is too soft. Finally, it's an excellent pick for sleepers who tend to sleep hot.





Is the Star Hybrid made in the USA?

The Star Hybrid is made in the USA using foreign and domestic components. It is built with CertiPur-US Certified foams and is GREENGUARD Gold Certified, because your bedroom’s air quality is just as important as your sleep quality.

Frequently Asked Questions


How would you rate the firmness of the Bear Cub - Kids Mattress?

We designed the Bear Cub - Kids Mattress to have the perfect combination of foam and coils. It is built with a solid core using 6" of individually wrapped coils for deep compression and durable support. In addition, the top layer is made of gel infused memory foam for cooling comfort. We would categorize the mattress to be a medium-firm, a 6.8 on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the most firm.





Does the Bear Cub - Kids Mattress smell?

The Bear Cub mattress uses foams that have little to no smell. If anything, it would be very slight when you first unpack the mattress, similar to a fresh pair of sneakers. Any sort of smell shall dissipate within a couple days.





What is the difference between All Foam and Hybrid?

Memory foam, unlike a traditional spring mattress, offers a contouring sensation for the sleeper — a kind of cuddly hug for a child’s growing body that keeps them comfortable throughout the night. A hybrid mattress offers a subtle comforting hug, plus an innerspring bounce which is the best for jumping on the bed (Shhh…don’t tell them Bear said that). In general, a hybrid mattress tends to have deeper compression and quicker response, which is perfect for a growing child.

        Adjustable Flex Bed Features
      
    

Compatible with All Mattresses: the non-slip mattress guard keeps your mattress in place as you change positions.

Adjustable height: legs can be fully adjusted to fit your height preference.

Zero-G Preset: feel the weightlessness effect of zero gravity for the ultimate chill-zone.

One-Touch Flat Preset: its easy to set your bed to the flat position with only one touch

6-Button Remote: easy to use wireless remote

Silent Drive Motors: the motors are designed for quiet operation.







Split King Option for Your Own Personal Comfort
Does your partner snore? Looking for some extra relief after a long day? The split king option lets you and your partner move independently from each-other. So you can both be in your ideal and most comfortable position.



Sleek & Innovative Design










For versatility and convenience, the Adjustable flex bed is designed to seamlessly fit into most modern bed frames. Careful positioning of the motors and linkages ensures they do not disrupt the bed frame's supports or under-bed storage.






Zero-G Preset raises the head and legs slightly above the heart to promote circulation and relieve lower back pressure.  This position helps evens out the pressure throughout your body – alleviating joints, neck muscles, upper back tension, and pressure on the hips and lower back.






Adjustable beds have many everyday advantages in terms of quality of sleep, convenience, and overall comfort. Need more reasons on why an adjustable bed is right for you? Read our blog.













Frequently Asked Questions


How can an Adjustable Bed Base help improve my sleep quality?

An Adjustable bed base can provide relief and enhance your comfort in various situations, such as snoring, reading or watching TV, addressing chronic pain, accommodating different mattress types, and managing acid reflux. These beds offer a versatile solution to improve your sleep and overall well-being.





What is Zero Gravity?

Zero Gravity refers to a neutral body posture that simulates weightlessness. Developed by NASA for astronauts during takeoff, Zero Gravity includes slightly raising both the head and foot of your bed for the most relaxed position possible.





How can the Adjustable Flex Bed help with relieving back pain?

The Adjustable Flex Bed allows you to raise both your head and feet into a comfortable position that reduces stress, particularly near your lower back. With wireless remote control, you can customize your unique angle for optimal comfort.





How difficult are delivery and setup?

The Adjustable Flex Bed is shipped directly to your home via FedEx Ground and assembly is quick and easy. Your shipment will include easy-to-follow instructions. We recommend two or more people be present for assembly.





Is the height of the Adjustable Flex Bed adjustable?

Yes, the Adjustable Flex Bed comes with four height-adjusting leg segments. Each leg segment is 3 inches. So you have the ability to adjust the clearance under the base to be 3, 6, 9 or 12 inches from the floor.





Can my partner and I move independently of each other on the Adjustable Flex Bed

Yes. We offer a Split King setup, which is two Twin XL bases side-by-side. You and your partner can lay next to each other, but each sleep in your favorite position. These separate units can also be synced to move together. Additional instructions are included with the owner’s manual you’ll receive upon delivery.





What is the weight capacity of the Adjustable Flex Bed?

The strong yet light-weight aluminum frame can support 750 lbs, evenly distributed.

        Adjustable Flex Bed Features
      
    

Compatible with All Mattresses: the non-slip mattress guard keeps your mattress in place as you change positions.

Adjustable height: legs can be fully adjusted to fit your height preference.

Zero-G Preset: feel the weightlessness effect of zero gravity for the ultimate chill-zone.

One-Touch Flat Preset: its easy to set your bed to the flat position with only one touch

6-Button Remote: easy to use wireless remote

Silent Drive Motors: the motors are designed for quiet operation.








Remote Control Overview




►









Split King Option for Your Own Personal Comfort
Does your partner snore? Looking for some extra relief after a long day? The split king option lets you and your partner move independently from each-other. So you can both be in your ideal and most comfortable position.



Sleek & Innovative Design










For versatility and convenience, the Adjustable flex bed is designed to seamlessly fit into most modern bed frames. Careful positioning of the motors and linkages ensures they do not disrupt the bed frame's supports or under-bed storage.






Zero-G Preset raises the head and legs slightly above the heart to promote circulation and relieve lower back pressure.  This position helps evens out the pressure throughout your body – alleviating joints, neck muscles, upper back tension, and pressure on the hips and lower back.






Adjustable beds have many everyday advantages in terms of quality of sleep, convenience, and overall comfort. Need more reasons on why an adjustable bed is right for you? Read our blog.













Adjustable Flex Bed Reviews







Frequently Asked Questions


What mattresses will work with the Adjustable Flex Bed?

All Bear Mattresses are compatible with the Adjustable Flex Bed. You can also use your current mattress, although we highly advise against a waterbed. If you have any questions about your current mattress working on the Adjustable Flex Bed, email our friendly support team or call 844-311-0035.





Can my partner and I move independently of each other on the Adjustable Flex Bed

Yes. We offer a Split King setup, which is two Twin XL bases side-by-side. You and your partner can lay next to each other, but each sleep in your favorite position. These separate units can also be synced to move together. Additional instructions are included with the owner’s manual you’ll receive upon delivery.





What is the weight capacity of the Adjustable Flex Bed?

The strong yet light-weight aluminum frame can support 750 lbs, evenly distributed.





Is the height of the Adjustable Flex Bed adjustable?

Yes, up to 12 inches.

Frequently Asked Questions


How do I clean my weighted blanket?

Spot clean only as the weight of the blanket might be more than what some at home washing machines can handle.





Are weighted blankets only for sleeping?

Weighted blankets provide numerous benefits, including deeper sleep, reduced symptoms of fibromyalgia, treatment for sensory overload—and much more! Weighted blankets offer a hug-like sensation that translates into deep touch pressure (DTP) therapy. This form of therapy has been shown to lower cortisol levels (the stress hormone) and increase serotonin levels (the feel-good hormone)—as well as increase melatonin (the sleepy hormone).





Can everyone in my family use this blanket?

Frequently Asked Questions


What is a mattress topper used for?

Our mattress topper adds an extra layer of cushioning and support to any mattress, making it feel softer and more comfortable. So, if your current mattress is too firm for your liking, adding a topper is the way to go.
However, if your mattress shows signs of wear-and-tear such as sagging, a topper will not fix the problem. Instead, consider investing in a new mattress that can last you for years to come. See our mattresses.
        




Should I buy a topper to go with my Bear Mattress?

We don’t think you need to buy both right away. Most customers think their Bear mattress feels just right. Your body may need a bit of time to adjust to the feeling of the new mattress. We suggest sleeping on your new mattress for 30 nights. Check out our firmness guide for more details.





How do I clean my mattress topper?

The cover’s zipper enclosure allows for removal and laundering for a cleaner, more hypoallergenic sleep experience. Read more about how you can give it a proper cleaning.





Will the mattress topper make me hot?

Nope. Our Pro Topper is made with memory foam. A premium circular knit cover combines silky smoothness with exceptional breathability to deliver cooling benefits on contact. So, you’ll stay cool as a cucumber at night.

What’s the difference between the Bear Pillow and the Bear Kids Pillow?

Cover: The Bear Kids Pillow uses the same Cool-to-the-touch Double-Ice Fabric as the The Bear Pillow.





Does the Bear Kids Pillow come with a pillowcase?

It does not come with an additional case, however, it comes with a cover that is washable, so you could choose not to use an additional pillowcase.





Will this pillow support my child’s head?

Yes! Although scaled down to a smaller size, the Kids Pillow is supportive and retains its shape, sleep after sleep.





How do you clean the Bear Kid Pillow?

Cover: Spot clean only, air dry. Do not machine wash. Do not tumble dry. Do not bleach or iron.

Frequently Asked Questions


How does the Bear GlacioTex Mattress Protector work?

The GlacioTex Mattress Protector is made with cutting edge technology to keep you cool and comfortable when you sleep. Our hypoallergenic GlacioTex fabric is made from fibers with high thermal conductivity that allow heat to be quickly and effectively pulled away from your body. Simply add this protector to your mattress and get ready for your coolest, most comfortable sleep yet.





Should I buy a protector to go with my Bear Mattress?

If you’re worried about stains or spills and want to protect your mattress to extend its lifetime, definitely consider buying a protector. The GlacioTex Cooling protector is waterproof and protects against stains and liquid damage, as well as providing protection from dust mites, bacteria, and allergens. Although the protector is waterproof, it is still breathable and because of the fibers with high thermal conductivity, the cover will help you stay cooler.





Can I wash my GlacioTex Mattress Protector?

Yes! The GlacioTex Mattress Protector can be machine washed on a cool or warm cycle and tumble dried on low. Please avoid the use of bleach on this product.
Read more about how you can give it a proper cleaning.






How do I arrange my GlacioTex Mattress Protector with my sheets?

We recommend adding your GlacioTex Mattress Protector directly over the surface of your mattress and then adding your sheets and bedding on top. The skirted edges of the Mattress Protector will provide a snug fit to your mattress and hold it in place.





Does the protector work with Celliant?

The mattress protectors do not interfere with the efficacy of the Celliant fabric woven into our mattress covers. Designed for your active lifestyle, Bear offers mattress protectors that allow you to sleep cool and dry with our advanced technology that is specifically engineered to work with every Bear mattress.

Are your pillows hypoallergenic?
